alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 31 at 7:53PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected along the Big Sandy River. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, southeast Mohave. * WHEN...Until 445 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Big Sandy River will continue to rise overnight due to excessive runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 748 PM MST, Automated gauge report indicated significant rise on the Big Sandy Wash at Highway 93 bridge. Flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river and water crossings are already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wikieup. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
